title: A Tank Commander Risks Everything For Children | Ardennes Fury | War Action Movie

sources.title: A Tank Commander Risks Everything For Children | Ardennes Fury | War Action Movie
sources.description:
A Tank Commander Risks Everything For Children | Ardennes Fury | War Action Movie

Amid the chaos of the Battle of the Bulge, an American armored squad finds itself encircled by enemy forces. As the clock ticks down to the devastating strikes of Operation Ardennes Fury, the fearless commander of the tank unit is faced with a life-altering choice: to risk everything and embark on a daring mission to save a group of orphaned children trapped in a nearby facility.

2014 - Stars: Tom Stedham, Bill Voorhees, Tino Struckmann
